[OpenHandleCodeExamples Code Examples]
== OpenHandle Python Code Examples ==

Here's how a native Python program (contained in file "[http://nurture.nature.com/tony/openhandle/code/python/handler.py handler.py]") can grab a handle data record:

{{{
% cat handler.py
#!/usr/bin/env python

import simplejson, urllib

OPENHANDLE = "http://nascent.nature.com/openhandle/handle"

args = {}
args.update({
    'id': '10100/nature',
    'format': 'json'
})

url = OPENHANDLE + '?' + urllib.urlencode(args)
h = simplejson.load(urllib.urlopen(url))

print h
}}}
